title: client sucks....
body: So, for a while now i've been having trouble with the lolclient in the loading screen. It simply won't load and crashes. When you restart league it keeps doing it. But now, when i restarted it I got a HTTP error.  Had to reinstall lol.airclient and then it took 2 hours to update when i tried to open league again.  This has happened to me a couple of times now, and frankly it's very frustrating.  * i've been loading in a ranked game every time it happened, which means i lost ranking and probably received a x9 report.

replies.body:
It seems like you had two separate issues unfortunately.  One issue seemed to appear in the Loading Screen and then when you tried to restart, you actually encountered a completely separate issue with the [Login Issues we had earlier](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/6yoYIj6i-516-login-issues-and-rads-errors).  

To confirm, are you still experiencing these same issues at all?  Or did it seem to resolve after this particular game?

Reply back and let me know!
